text: Victor/Victoria is a 1982 American British romantic musical comedy movie directed by Blake Edwards and is the remake of the 1933 German movie Viktor und Viktoria. It stars Julie Andrews, James Garner, Lesley Ann Warren, Robert Preston, Alex Karras, John Rhys-Davies, Graham Stark, Glen Murphy, Peter Arne, Geoffrey Beevers, Ina Skriver and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 7 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1983. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:1982 musical movies Category:1982 LGBT movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British musical movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:MGM movies
title: Victor/Victoria
